site.name: BlancPage Solutions
site.tagline: Start fresh with innovative solutions tailored to your business needs

hero.title: Welcome to BlancPage Solutions
hero.subtitle: I help businesses unlock the power of their data with innovative BI and development solutions

about.title: About Me
about.description: I believe every great achievement starts with a blank page. Through BlancPage Solutions, I help you write your success story with cutting-edge data and development solutions that drive real business value.

profile.title: I'm Dave
profile.name: David LeBlanc
profile.bio: With over a decade of experience in technology and business intelligence, I specialize in transforming complex data into actionable insights. I'm passionate about helping businesses make data-driven decisions and building scalable solutions that drive growth.

services.title: Business Intelligence
services.description: I design and implement BI solutions that transform raw data into strategic insights for better decision making

services.title: Data Engineering
services.description: I build robust data pipelines and architectures that ensure your data is clean, accessible, and scalable

services.title: Solution Architecture
services.description: I design comprehensive technical solutions that align with your business goals and scale with your growth

services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: I develop end-to-end applications from database to user interface, delivering complete technical solutions

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! I'll get back to you soon.
